text: Based on Gaston's referral of Rachel Nabors, I started reading one of her articles on web animation yesterday and it turned out to be really good: <http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2014/11/18/the-state-of-animation-2014/>

attachments.title: The State Of Animation 2014 - Smashing Magazine
attachments.text: Rachel Nabors talks about the State of Animation in 2014 and a new Web Animation API hat might unit CSS animation and interactive JavaScript animation.
attachments.fallback: Smashing Magazine: The State Of Animation 2014 - Smashing Magazine
